sentence.Network_en: Children of Daba Mountain have to go to school by boat everyday.

sentence.Network_en: The Daba religion also functions as the repository of most of the Mosuo culture and history.
sentence.Network_cn: 大坝的宗教也成为了库的摩梭文化和历史.
